content: Chi Man VONG, Matthew – Faculty of Science and Technology | University of Macau Skip to content Chi Man VONG, Matthew黃志文 Associate Professor Personal Homepage: https://www.fst.um.edu.mo/personal/cmvong/ Academic Qualification PhD in Software Engineering, FST, University of Macau (2005) M.Sc. in Software Engineering, FST, University of Macau (2000) B.Sc. in Software Engineering, FST, University of Macau (1996) Research Research Interests Intelligent Systems Contact Details Faculty of Science and Technology University of Macau, E11 Avenida da Universidade, Taipa, Macau, China Room: E11-4013 Telephone: (853) 8822-4357 Fax: (853) 8822-2426 Email: cmvong Page load link Go to Top
